pages.text: Cats love to play with toys. Here you will find some toys to make for them.

pages.title: Cat Toy
pages.text: Your cat loves to play with stuff. Make this toy and throw it around, and your cat will bring it back to you.

pages.title: Yarn
pages.text: A ball of yarn that your kitty will unravel.

pages.title: Cardboard Box
pages.text: The cardboard box is one of your cat's favorite things to play with. It doesn't matter what came in it, it's a box!
